channel.title: oH NoZ!
channel.description:
I need a program that inputs stuff for me, or a tool that quickly lets me do it. I must complete 230 tables with different information. Here is an example: http://bulletro.com/customs.htm
I have to do 230 of those which takes HELLA LONG BY HAND. Any Suggestions?
EDIT: IT CAN BE ANYTHING, such as a code that inputs, or a program (reccemended*)

item.title: oH NoZ!
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Ok. Take your time.

Read full topic

item.title: oH NoZ!
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Ok. Heres what I need you to do. make 2 aditional pages, and make the following:

ITEM NAME FILE - Obtainable from OBTAINABLE FILE

SUMMARY

Item Class: Card
Compounds on: COMPOUND FILE
Weight: 0

and another one with

ITEM NAME FILE - Obtainable from OBTAINABLE FILE

SUMMARY

Attack: ATTACK
Item Class: ITEM CLASS
Weight: 0
Applicable Job: APPLICABLE JOB

tell me when ya ready.
I will make the files once your reply.

EDIT: Done. You can get the new information (COMPOUND, ATTACK) in these files:
Card Compound
http://bulletro.com/customs/DESC2.txt
Attack
http://bulletro.com/customs/DESC3.txt

EDIT: Oh shit, lol, I forgot bout that.
YAY DUDE!!. You da best.

Edit2: There seems to be a problem… Can you examine it for me? I can’t get it>_>

Aww man!!!, these need 2 seperate. I will wait for your response and I will give you your second instructions if you do it.

This is not that different, it’s just renaming those bolded text and getting different information.

Please legit?

@nator123123 wrote:

OMFG! It’s done!!
Wow, dude. thanks so much. But I just have one more request.

Can you make two more copies of that page, because that is my item page, then equipment page, then card page. It’s the same but just make the upload thing that uplodas it different.

For the equips page, make NAME URL upload to:
NAME2.txt
Make DESCRIPTION URL upload to:
DESC2.txt
Make Obtainable URL upload to:
Obtainable2.txt

And for card page,
For the equips page, make NAME URL upload to:
NAME3.txt
Make DESCRIPTION URL upload to:
DESC3.txt
Make Obtainable URL upload to:
Obtainable3.txt

Can you do that please?

I’ma work on those other files. this should take a snap

Yea, it goes by id, not by order. So you can add it anywhere.

And I changed it to proper cased and the images are now displaying.

I tested it myself ^^

item.title: oH NoZ!
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

I viewed the image sources, and they are alike.

Edit: i think I got it… Try This

Change that one part to this:

<td style="border-left:1px #7f9e61 solid"><img style="width:75; height:100;" src="http://bulletro.com/images/IMAGE NAME.bmp" /></td>

That should do it.

Yer, tested it and it works, input it.

Now, can you do the Proper Case thing? Seems to be in-complete. Sorry, I am kinda in a hurry.
Just… Take your time. Without you this wouldn’t even get this far xD

Read full topic
